title: Christen Eriksen Berg
text:
Christen Eriksen Berg (20 November 1864 – 5 August 1926) was a Norwegian telegrapher and politician.
He was born in <a href="Brevik%2C%20Norway">Brevik</a> to Andreas Gerhard Berg and Gina Thomsen. He served as mayor of <a href="Krager%C3%B8">Kragerø</a> (1921). He was elected representative to the <a href="Storting">Storting</a> for the period 1922–1924, for the <a href="Liberal%20Party%20%28Norway%29">Liberal Party</a>.
